name: Welcome to Paradise
description: Watching the T.V. in the comfort of your cell, a news flash breaks. A marriage made in hell, today the wedding of all weddings will take place. The newly engaged Baron couple will tie the knot this afternoon. You can't believe what you've just heard! You know that if these two Barons get married it will be the end of life as you know it. You must break away from the prison guards and put a stop to this wedding. This is the excuse you have been waiting for.
